::Autofire::

Autofire listens patiently to Megatron, holding his chain gun 
dangerously at the survival bit. He knew that he could blow Megatron 
to scrap in several seconds, since Megatron was in such bad 
condition. He laughs at the last part.

"You obviously don't know the life of a mercenary, Megatron. Leading 
a faction is one thing, but the universe is quite another. A 
mercenary lives to be hired and to kill, steal, sabatauge, whatever 
the mission. What would I do with the entire universe? Ruling a 
faction would still have competition, battle, everything that has 
made up my life to date, but ruling the universe would get extremely 
boring."

He aims at a stalagmite in the cave, blowing it apart with a round 
from his chain gun.

"You of all people should know that lives and aliegences can end in 
an instant. I worked for Autobots before I worked for Decepticons, 
and for Decepticons before that, and spent some time freelance as 
well. Sitting in a throne room with no action might suit you, but it 
doesn't appeal to me."

His chaingun moves back to aim at Megatron's chest. "Now that we have 
the background info down, what is your status on this planet?"






--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "Very well then, your entitled to that" Megatron strained. "As you 
probably
> know, I was turned into Galvatron in the year 2005, and then spent 
months
> on a planet that used to exist called Thrull. I soaked in a plasma 
bath, or
> I should say Galvatron did, and it damaged his circuits, that's 
when all
> that was me died. I then was able to watch him destroy everything I
> created, the Decepticon empire, the vast territorial gains in the 
galaxies,
> and my reputation, and I was powerless to stop him. But now, the 
idiot
> revived me, for who knows what reason" Megatron stated, then closed 
his
> eyes, expecting to die at the hands of another surge of pain from 
his
> master. But it never came.
> 
> He adressed Autofire again, "I came here because I sensed a source 
of
> energon being burnt, I was hoping to find a generator, or 
something, but it
> was you, which could be much more profitable to both of us". He then
> checked his energon readings, " I am weak now because I plotted 
against
> Galvatron, but little did I know he had control over me. He flooded 
my
> circuits with raw energon to destroy me. But I survived, just like 
I will
> survive this encounter Autofire, it dosent matter what you do. I 
was built
> to not only be the Decepticon leader, but a survivor as well. I was 
ancient
> when your designs where first thought up. I have survived for over 
16
> million years, and will continue to. This time nothing shall stop 
me, and
> my dream of conquest. You Autofire, are a Mercencary, but little do 
you
> know, you are born to rule this Universe, by birthright. All other
> creatures are inferior to you Autofire, and you could be a soldier 
today,
> to lead the Decepticon empire into the futur" he finished.
